Question: Saxony Trade & Invest CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Saxony Trade & Invest Corp.

CES 2024 Products

- Alternative drives, lightweight engineering, automated / autonomous driving, bike mobility
- Renewable energies, energy storage, hydrogen, Resources / Recycling
- Cell & gene therapie, oncology, regenerative medicine, smart medical devices, implants, eHealth
- Lightweight engineering, semiconductor material, sustainable construction, technical textiles
